titleStmt.title: Whereas several persons of wicked and restless spirits have industriously gone about to spread false news, and to promote malicious slanders and calumnies with an intention to raise divisions amongst His Majesties good and loyal subjects of this kingdom ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Tyrconnell.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Tyrconnel, Richard Talbot, Earl of, 1630-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham :
and reprinted at London by George Croom ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 7th day of December, 1688."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
